channel.title: GunZ
channel.description:
I've decided to create another topic because all the others haven't been posted in - in years.
Anyway i've found the URL for the patch updates for the Korean version of GunZ. KGunZ gets all the updates before they release internationally so i've created a list of about 100 updates going back to 2007.
I am forced to use tinyurl because the admins have decided that I run a server because of my url.. (which is false) http://tinyurl.com/kgunzpatchdl
Also if anyone of you are into private servers the big server LegacyGamers will be coming back soon with the original owner (holy shit I am there as well, name is Aaron).

item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:365016”]We only ever censor a URL when someone spams it, mass-advertises it, or it hosts malicious content. Did that ever happen with your URL?[/quote]I had showed off the forum I created in Web Design and you guys had blocked it.

Read full topic
